author: sarowe
msg: SOLR-3602: Maven configuration: Exclude new zookeeper 3.4.5 transitive dependency org.slf4j:slf4j-log4j12

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-988, AVRO-1209: Add options to make fields in generated classes private and to make generated classes immutable, without setters.  Contributed by Jeff Kolesky.

author: gtully
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-4196 - fix order of removedest and removesubscription commands in network bridge async advisory processing - https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3038 revisit - temp dest should not be deleted client side before close b/c open consumers will not get advisories due to no destination - just clearing the map is sufficient; the broker will deal with removal of the temp dest as part of the removeInfo

author: gtully
msg: fix up use of wrong mbean object name for durable sub - use system assigned port
